pr_title: [#10176] Fixes for UAT: Instructor edit page

timeline.message: Disable dropdown for feedback path when there is no alternatives

Remember previous input for toggling generate option

Might have a better way to do this. But since the model have to be sync, I don't see a better way without introducing excessive overhead just for 2 components
Add cursor not-allowed styling to disabled input fields

timeline.bodyText: Is there any better name than storageModel?
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: tempModel? cacheModel? I can't really find a good name for it, therefore the long comment.
replies.author: ccyccyccy
